name: Eggers - A Mizkif Twitch Game
description:
Eggers, a Twitch IRC chat integrated game specifically made in theme of streamer "Mizkif".

Eggers is a large player-base game designed for popular twitch streamer "Mizkif" and their audience. Players can enter a number of commands to influence the game.

Chat Controls:

  • !play = Join lobby
  • !boost = boost in upward direction (based on angle of egg)
  • !boost <1-5> = boost multiplier
  • !boost <1-5> <username> = boost towards username

Streamer Controls (Play Mode):

  • Left Click + Drag = Pan Up/Down
  • Right Click + Drag = Pan Tilt

Streamer Controls (Spectator Mode):

  • WASD = Move Camera
  • Scroll/1-2 = Move Focus

Eggers is still in development and currently in Early Access.

Check the progress on future updates here: Eggers - A Mizkif Twitch Game | Trello.

Please report any bugs to Emuzia (@EmuziaGameDev) / Twitter.

If you are an artist willing to work together for future visual/audio updates contact me at Emuzia (@EmuziaGameDev) / Twitter.

Enjoy!
